remarks: Existential introduction, using implicit substitition.  Compare Lemma 14 of [Tarski] p. 70.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-1994.)  (Revised by NM, 3-Feb-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
spimeh.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
spimeh.2 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
spimeh $p |- ( ph -> E. x ps ) $.
